title: Create Interview with Job Description
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
Enter a job description or use the enhanced JD feature to generate one
Save the job description
Verify that skill recommendations are displayed
expected_result: The AI extracts key skills from the job description and displays them

title: Select Skills and Difficulty Level
steps: Select skills from the AI suggestions or add custom skills
Choose the difficulty level of the questions (hard, moderate, etc.)
expected_result: The skills and difficulty level are saved and used for generating interview questions

title: Generate Standard and Role-Based Questions
steps: Verify that standard questions are generated
Verify that role-based questions are generated with ideal answers
Customize or delete questions as desired
expected_result: The AI generates questions based on the job description and skills

title: Create Interview with AI Avatar (Advanced Plan)
steps: Select an AI avatar (available for advanced plan users)
Verify that the lip syncing aligns with the script
expected_result: The AI avatar is selected and lip syncing is aligned with the script

title: Create Interview and Generate Public Interview Link
steps: Click the create option
Verify that a unique public interview link is generated
expected_result: The interview is created and a public interview link is generated

title: Verify Candidate Application Flow
steps: Enter the public interview link as an interested candidate
Fill in candidate details
Verify that the AI system verifies the email address using an OTP
Verify that the AI reviews the resume and assesses the ré score (if enabled)
Verify that the candidate proceeds to the video interview stage if they meet the threshold
expected_result: The candidate application flow is successful and the AI system takes over

title: Verify candidate's interview score is displayed
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview
Verify the interview score is displayed
expected_result: The interview score is displayed correctly

title: Verify candidate's communication score is displayed
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview
Verify the communication score is displayed
expected_result: The communication score is displayed correctly

title: Verify comprehensive summary of the interview is displayed
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview
Verify the comprehensive summary is displayed
expected_result: The comprehensive summary is displayed correctly, including observations, positives, and negatives

title: Verify action buttons (select/reject) are displayed
steps: Visit the responses tab
Click on a candidate's video interview
Verify the action buttons (select/reject) are displayed
expected_result: The action buttons (select/reject) are displayed correctly

title: Verify ré screening process works correctly
steps: Create an interview and upload résumés
Submit the résumés for screening
Verify the AI assigns a ré score and provides a recommendation
expected_result: The ré screening process works correctly, assigning a ré score and providing a recommendation

title: Verify candidate can submit an interview at their convenience
steps: Send an interview link to a candidate
Verify the candidate can submit their interview within 24 hours
expected_result: The candidate is able to submit their interview within 24 hours

title: Verify interview screening process works correctly
steps: Initiate the interview screening process
Verify the summary is displayed correctly
expected_result: The interview screening process works correctly, displaying the summary correctly
